Key Match Events: Bhanuka Rajapaksa scored 31 runs off 14 balls and helped Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by four wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Bhanuka Rajapaksa stated that Sri Lanka wanted to make a comeback after being bowled out for 105 against Afghanistan in a previous match
Others: Bhanuka Rajapaksa was put at five to strengthen the middle order, contrary to his IPL position
